docs.snippet: As he begins his final stretch, President Obama has been trying to counter the glass-is-half-empty view coming from so many candidates intent on succeeding him....
docs.lead_paragraph: As he begins his final stretch, President Obama has been trying to counter the glass-is-half-empty view coming from so many candidates intent on succeeding him.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; largely positive view of United States presented by Pres Barack Obama during his final State of the Union address contrasts profoundly with dim view espoused by Republicans; vision that seems more credible to American public will greatly influence 2016 election.

headline.main: State of the Union Speech Is One Half of Nation’s Political Split Screen

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett and Julie Hirschfeld Davis contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: The United Nations' nuclear watchdog is likely to confirm on Friday that Iran has curtailed its nuclear programme as agreed with world powers, paving the way for sanctions to be lifted, Iran and a diplomatic source said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations' nuclear watchdog is likely to confirm on Friday that Iran has curtailed its nuclear programme as agreed with world powers, paving the way for sanctions to be lifted, Iran and a diplomatic source said.

docs.snippet: Glittering glass beads produced at the Preciosa factory in Desna can be found across the world, a favorite of the Masai and Samburu tribes in Kenya and Tanzania, and the Kayapos of the Amazon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Glittering glass beads produced at the Preciosa factory in Desna can be found across the world, a favorite of the Masai and Samburu tribes in Kenya and Tanzania, and the Kayapos of the Amazon.
docs.abstract: Desna Journal; Desna, Czech Republic, has been center of Bohemian bead production for more than 150 years; glass beads produced at Preciosa factory, which employs 900 of 3,000 people living in town, can be found across the world--from the Amazon to Kenya, India and North America.

headline.main: Glass Beads Made in Czech Village Adorn Bodies of the World’s Tribes
headline.print_headline: Glass Beads Made in Czech Village Adorn Bodies of the World’s Tribes

docs.snippet: The suicide attacker who detonated a bomb that killed 10 German tourists in the heart of Istanbul's historic district had registered as a refugee just a week earlier, Turkish officials said Wednesday, raising questions over whether extremists are ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The suicide attacker who detonated a bomb that killed 10 German tourists in the heart of Istanbul's historic district had registered as a refugee just a week earlier, Turkish officials said Wednesday, raising questions over whether extremists are posing as asylum-seekers to inflame anti-immigrant sentiment in Europe.

headline.main: Istanbul Suicide Bomber Registered as Refugee Before Attack
headline.print_headline: Istanbul Suicide Bomber Registered as Refugee Before Attack

docs.snippet: An Islamic State suicide bomber who killed 10 German tourists in the heart of Istanbul's historic district entered Turkey as a refugee from Syria and went undetected as he was not on any watch lists, Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said on Wednesda...
docs.lead_paragraph: An Islamic State suicide bomber who killed 10 German tourists in the heart of Istanbul's historic district entered Turkey as a refugee from Syria and went undetected as he was not on any watch lists, Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Istanbul Bomber Entered Turkey as Refugee From Syria, PM Says
headline.print_headline: Istanbul Bomber Entered Turkey as Refugee From Syria, PM Says
